summary:
The X-Men are a group of superhero mutants from Marvel Comics. They were created in 1963 by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby. Despite an initial cancellation, the X-Men became very popular after their return in 1975. The team includes characters like Professor X, a telepath who leads the group, and Magneto, a powerful mutant with magnetic abilities.

X-Men stories often discuss important topics like discrimination and justice. Mutants in the Marvel Universe have special powers due to a gene, and the X-Men fight against those who hate or fear them. They have appeared in comics, TV, movies, and games, becoming one of Marvel's most famous franchises.
title: X-Men
